net.realmproject.dcm.features.values

Interface Values

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DeviceEventPublisher, Identity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IValueDevice

    public interface Values
extends Identity, DeviceEventPublisher

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.Serializable getValue()
      Gets the current value of this device
      default void publishValue()
      Publishes the result of the getValue method as a VALUE_CHANGED event
      void setValue(java.io.Serializable val)
      Sets the value of this device.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.realmproject.dcm.event.identity.Identity

      • Methods inherited from interface net.realmproject.dcm.event.publisher.DeviceEventPublisher

        publish, publish, publish

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        java.io.Serializable getValue()
        Gets the current value of this device
        Returns:
        the value of this device

      • setValue

        void setValue(java.io.Serializable val)
        Sets the value of this device. Users should not expect that a call to setValue(X) followed by a call to getValue() will return X. Due to the nature of physical devices, it may take some time for the device to reach the desired state (if it ever does).

        It is also possible for a device to accept values which act as deltas or commands, in which case the result of getValue should logically match up with the requested action, but may not be an equivalent value or even a similar data structure.
        Parameters:
        val - The value to set this device to

      • publishValue

        default void publishValue()
        Publishes the result of the getValue method as a VALUE_CHANGED event
